title: Inter-District Football: Hobart versus N.W. Coast
other_title: Australian Rules Football, Hobart versus North West Coast at West Park Oval, Burnie, 1924
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Social life and customs
abstract: Actuality footage from 1924 (silent) which records a football match between Hobart vs. North West Coast at West Park Oval Burnie (1924).
description: A short historic record of a match filmed on 19th July, 1924 in Burnie. The inter-district Australian Rules football match was well attended and played to a crowd of 12,000. We are first introduced to the Hobart team members followed by North West Coast. Hats seem to be the order of the day and many spectators crowd the edge of the playing field in order to get a good vantage point! North West Coast wins the match of the day by 7 Goals 21 behinds to Hobart's 6 Goals 11 behinds. Source: NFSA
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002943; A Tasmanian Time Capsule; Active; 2014
